user_question: How can we use AI to help conserve the endangered axolotl in its natural habitat?
final_answer: AI can help conserve the endangered axolotl by monitoring their populations using image recognition, predicting environmental changes with data analysis, and optimizing breeding programs through genetic algorithms.

Plan: 1) Apply image recognition to monitor axolotl populations. 2) Use data analysis to predict environmental changes in their habitat. 3) Implement genetic algorithms to optimize breeding programs.
